post:
**Last chance** to get this offer on our new NVMe nodes!

As a company we have been in business since 2003 and our main focus is on our highend clients. But we also like to cater to you, the lowend clients. All our servers are owned and we are a RIPE member (we have a /22 and 4 /24 IP space).

**Please check out our NL super fast pure NVMe VMs offer**

All orders include:
* AMD EPYC 7452
* 1 IPv4 + IPv6/64
* NVMe RAID 10
* KVM Virtualization
* Located in The Netherlands
  
---
  
# YEARLY RECURRING OFFERS
Coupon code: **ZXNJ1906KT**

1 vCore - 2GB Ram - 30GB NVMe Disk - 5TB BW - 20 €/year (+vat if applicable) - [Order Now](https://clients.naranja.tech/cart.php "Order Now")

2 vCores - 4GB Ram - 60GB NVMe Disk - 10TB BW - 40 €/year (+vat if applicable) - [Order Now](https://clients.naranja.tech/cart.php "Order Now")

3 vCores - 6GB Ram - 90GB NVMe Disk - 15TB BW - 60 €/year (+vat if applicable) - [Order Now](https://clients.naranja.tech/cart.php "Order Now")

_Coupon code also works on the larger plans up to **64GB RAM**_
  
---
